title: STK operates in 22+ cities across 8 countries
statement: STK Steakhouse has locations in cities including Atlanta, Los Angeles, NYC, Toronto, London, Milan, Dubai, and Doha across the United States, Canada, Mexico, England, Italy, UAE, and Qatar.

citations.quote: Arizona Scottsdale California Los Angeles San Diego San Francisco... Qatar Doha United Arab Emirates Dubai England London – Stratford London – Strand Italy Milan
